import React from 'react' import CheckoutProduct from './CheckoutProduct'; import "./Payment.css" import { useStateValue } from './StateProvider' import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; function Payment() { const[{basket,user},dispatch]=useStateValue(); const stripe= useStr return (

Checkout ({basket.length} items)

Delivery Address

{user?.email}

B-44 Aakash Nagar

Durg, Chhattisgarh, India

Review items and Delivery

{basket.map(item=>( ))}

Payment Method

) } export default Payment
